mobileResponsivenessTip: Ensure content scales properly across all devices for a smoother mobile experience.
loadingSpeedTip: Optimize images and scripts to reduce page load times.
seoOptimizationTip: Improve keyword targeting and use more descriptive alt texts for images.
userExperienceTip: Ensure all elements are easy to navigate and provide clear call-to-action buttons.
bookingFlowTip: Simplify the booking form and minimize steps to improve the user experience.
